data.text: Any of numerous tropical and subtropical chiefly freshwater fishes of the family Cichlidae, which includes the tilapias and many species that are popular as aquarium fish.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Any of many tropical fish, of the family <xref>Cichlidae</xref>, popular as aquarium fish.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: freshwater fishes of tropical America and Africa and Asia similar to American sunfishes; some are food fishes; many small ones are popular in aquariums
data.attributionText: from WordNet 3.0 Copyright 2006 by Princeton University. All rights reserved.
